org.eclipse.scada.configuration.security

Interface SignatureRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SignatureRuleImpl

    public interface SignatureRule
extends Rule
    A representation of the model object 'Signature Rule'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Trusted Certification Authority
    • Indent Xml
    • Post Processor
    • Reload Period

    See Also:
    SecurityPackage.getSignatureRule()

      • getTrustedCertificationAuthority

         getTrustedCertificationAuthority()
        Returns the value of the 'Trusted Certification Authority' containment reference list. The list contents are of type CA.

        If the meaning of the 'Trusted Certification Authority' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Trusted Certification Authority' containment reference list.

        boolean isIndentXml()
        Returns the value of the 'Indent Xml' attribute. The default value is "false".

      • getReloadPeriod

        int getReloadPeriod()
        Returns the value of the 'Reload Period' attribute. The default value is "0". The period (milliseconds) in which all CAs will be reloaded.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Reload Period' attribute.
        See Also:
        setReloadPeriod(int), SecurityPackage.getSignatureRule_ReloadPeriod()

        See Also:
        getReloadPeriod()
